sentence.Network_en: Modest and honorific is a typical social deixis, which includes modest title , honorific title.

sentence.Network_en: Without deixis , it is almost impossible to understand the meaning of any stretch of language.

means.word_mean: 1. the function of pointing or specifying from the perspective of a participant in an act of speech or writing; aspects of a communication whose interpretation depends on knowledge of the context in which the communication occurs
